Journal.Title: The British journal of general practice : the journal of the Royal College of General Practitioners

Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID in children and young people: uncertainty and contradictions.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Manchester; Professor of General Practice Research, School of Medicine, Keele University, Keele.
Expert by experience; Senior Lecturer and Honorary Consultant in Genomic Medicine, Division of Evolution and Genomic Sciences, School of Biological Sciences, University of Manchester, Manchester.
Manchester University Foundation Trust; Honorary Senior Lecturer, School of Biological Sciences, University of Manchester, Manchester.
